metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0547 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability in libmedia in Mediaserver could enable a local malicious application to access data outside of its permission levels. This issue is rated as High because it is a general bypass for operating system protections that isolate application data from other applications. Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-33861560.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> See CVE-2015-1538 for information on ubuntu use of android tools

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
